i1.name: Dismounted Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Kled''' is only vulnerable to {{tip|death}} while dismounted. '''Kled''' has {{sti|health|{{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|{{ccd|Kled|hp_base}}+{{ccd|Kled|hp_lvl}}*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1))}} '''base''' health}}}}, which is not improved by sources of {{as|'''bonus''' health}}, as well as reduced {{as|'''base''' movement speed}} and increased {{sti|attack range}}. Percent-health effects consider '''Kled & Skaarl's''' combined {{as|'''maximum''' health}}, meaning that an unmounted '''Kled''' is always considered to be ''low'' health.

'''Kled''' gains {{passive progression/deprecated version|100 to 185|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} when moving towards enemy {{tip|champions}} within {{tt|900|estimated}} range, but his basic attacks against them are reduced to {{as|80% AD}} damage. Additionally, he gains the ability to restore '''Skaarl's''' {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 3||''{{as|Courage|buzzword}}''}} to {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard||reunite}} again.

{{sbc|Innate - Courage:}} '''Kled''' gains 15 {{as|Courage|buzzword}} when [[basic attack|basic attacking]] an enemy champion, 20 {{as|Courage|buzzword}} whenever an enemy champion he damaged dies within 3 seconds, 4 {{as|Courage|buzzword}} for {{tip|minion}} kills, and 5 {{as|Courage|buzzword}} when basic attacking a [[structures|structure]] or epic {{tip|monster}}. At 100 {{as|Courage|buzzword}}, '''Skaarl''' returns with {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|4|key=%|50 to 80|1 to 16}} of '''Skaarl's''' '''maximum''' health}}. {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard||''Mounting up''}} resets the {{sti|cooldowns}} of {{ai|Bear Trap on a Rope|Kled}} and {{ai|Jousting|Kled}}.

While at the allied [[Spawn|fountain]], 25 {{as|Courage|buzzword}} is generated every {{fd|0.25}} seconds. {{si|Recall|Recalling}} fully restores '''Skaarl's''' {{as|Courage|buzzword}} and health. If reuniting outside of base, '''Skaarl''' gets ''Frayed Nerves'', which prevents him from gaining {{as|Courage|buzzword}} for 30 seconds.

The current status of '''Kled's''' own health is preserved between subsequent dismounts. While mounted, {{tip|heal|healing}} will first affect '''Skaarl's''' health and will only restore '''Kled's''' health while '''Skaarl''' is at ''full'' health.

Percent-health effects consider Kled & Skaarl's combined maximum health, meaning that an unmounted Kled is always considered to be low health.Kled gains Unknown value: passive progression/deprecated version 100 to 185 color=ms bonus movement speed when moving towards enemy champions within 900 range, but his basic attacks against them are reduced to 80% AD damage. Additionally, he gains the ability to restore Skaarl's Courage to reunite again.Innate - Courage: Kled gains 15 Courage when basic attack an enemy champion, 20 Courage whenever an enemy champion he damaged dies within 3 seconds, 4 Courage for minion kills, and 5 Courage when basic attacking a structures or epic monster. At 100 Courage, Skaarl returns with Unknown value: passive progression/deprecated version 4 key=% 50 to 80 1 to 16 of Skaarl's maximum health. If reuniting outside of base, Skaarl gets Frayed Nerves, which prevents him from gaining Courage for 30 seconds.The current status of Kled's own health is preserved between subsequent dismounts. While mounted, healing will first affect Skaarl's health and will only restore Kled's health while Skaarl is at full health.
i1.notes:
* [[Decoy]]s are counted as champions for all of this ability's effects, other than the takedown one.
* '''Kled's''' {{as|health}} is rounded up while '''Skaarl's''' is rounded down.
* It is possible to get the {{as|Courage|buzzword}} from base but have '''Kled''' and '''Skaarl''' reunite out of base.
* It is possible for the [[Nexus Obelisk]] to not be able to bring '''Kled''' down from '''Skaarl''' for a few seconds, even if '''Skaarl''' has no health.
* {{Pending for test}} {{ai|Wild Growth|Lulu}} and {{ii|Elixir of Iron}}

q1.name: Pocket Pistol
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Kled''' periodically [[stock]]s an ammo charge, up to a maximum of 2. '''Kled''' will store ammo even while {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard|Kled|mounted}}.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Kled''' sprays a cone of five ''pellets'' in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} while {{tip|dash|recoiling}} 250 units in the opposite direction.

''Pellets'' collide into the first enemy champion they hit, and deal 20% damage per pellet beyond the first. Each ''pellet'' that hits an enemy champion or epic monster restores {{ai|Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard 3|Kled|Courage}}, by 5 and {{fd|2.5}} respectively.
q1.descriptionHtml: Passive: Kled periodically stocks an ammo charge, up to a maximum of 2. Kled will store ammo even while mounted.Active: Kled sprays a cone of five pellets in the target direction, dealing physical damage while recoiling 250 units in the opposite direction.Pellets collide into the first enemy champion they hit, and deal 20% damage per pellet beyond the first. Each pellet that hits an enemy champion or epic monster restores Courage, by 5 and 2.5 respectively.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|35 to 95}} {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|35*1.8 to 95*1.8}} {{as|(+ 144% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q1.notes:
* The backwards dash from ''Pocket Pistol'' can pass terrain.
* ''Pocket Pistol'' can be cast while {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}} but '''Kled''' will not {{tip|dash}} backwards.
* ''Pocket Pistol'' will cast from wherever '''Kled''' is at the end of the cast time.
q1.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  1 as 1 and riot's value 0,0,0,0,0 as 0
q1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '3' as '3' and riot's value '11,10,9,8,7' as '11/10/9/8/7'

w1.name: Violent Tendencies
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Kled''' periodically enters a frenzy that grants him {{sti|attack speed|{{as|150% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}} on his next 4 basic attacks within 4 seconds after the first, with the final attack dealing {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, capped against {{tip|monster|monsters}}.
''{{tip|Turrets}} are only affected by the base damage.''
w1.descriptionHtml: Passive: Kled periodically enters a frenzy that grants him 150% bonus attack speed on his next 4 basic attacks within 4 seconds after the first, with the final attack dealing bonus physical damage, capped against monsters.Turrets are only affected by the base damage.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|20 to 60}} {{as|(+ {{ap|4.5 to 6.5}}% {{as|(+ 5% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}|Maximum Damage Against Monsters|{{ap|220 to 260}}}}

e1.name: Unmounted Jousting
description: This ability is unusable while {{ai|Dismounted Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard|Kled|unmounted}}.
e1.descriptionHtml: This ability is unusable while <HtmlTooltip class="champion-ability blue link" data-champkey="Kled">unmounted<template #content>Dismounted Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard</template></HtmlTooltip>.
